text:
Going for a #lockdown is not the solution, we can’t disturb the #economy again says #goa CM @DrPramodPSawant.
CM also said that there is no restriction on the border. Urges people to take  #vaccine, follow the #SOPs & maintain #socialdistance, in this way we can fight #covid19. https://t.co/hk3a5Ea7Wi
